name: Underdark Cavern
description: A massive underground cavern connects to the vast network of the Underdark, containing unique ecosystems and dangerous creatures. The rare materials and exotic creatures attract explorers and traders, while the hostile environment and dangerous inhabitants make survival extremely difficult.
atmosphere: Footsteps echo through space so vast it feels like another world. Air carries strange fungi, exotic creatures, and something ancient and alien scent. Massive cavern stretches into darkness so deep it seems to swallow light itself. Skin crawls with sense of being watched by creatures that have never seen sun. Taste of rare minerals and unknown dangers fills mouth. Weight of entire underground ecosystem presses down on you.
